```typescript
// Theme Toggle Module
class ThemeToggle {
  private themeToggle: HTMLElement | null;
  private currentTheme: string;

  constructor() {
    this.themeToggle = document.querySelector('.theme-toggle');
    this.currentTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme') || 'light';
    this.init();
  }

  private init(): void {
    this.applyTheme();
    this.setupEventListeners();
  }

  private applyTheme(): void {
    document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', this.currentTheme);
    this.updateIcon();
  }

  private updateIcon(): void {
    if (this.themeToggle) {
      const icon = this.themeToggle.querySelector('i');
      if (icon) {
        icon.className = this.currentTheme === 'dark' ? 'fas fa-sun' : 'fas fa-moon';
      }
    }
  }

  private setupEventListeners(): void {
    this.themeToggle?.addEventListener('click', () => {
      this.toggleTheme();
    });
  }

  private toggleTheme(): void {
    this.currentTheme = this.currentTheme === 'light' ? 'dark' : 'light';
    this.applyTheme();
    localStorage.setItem('theme', this.currentTheme);
  }
}

// Scroll Reveal Module
class ScrollReveal {
  private elements: NodeListOf<Element>;

  constructor() {
    this.elements = document.querySelectorAll('.fade-in');
    this.init();
  }

  private init(): void {
    this.observeElements();
  }

  private observeElements(): void {
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver(
      (entries) => {
        entries.forEach((entry) => {
          if (entry.isIntersecting) {
            entry.target.classList.add('visible');
          }
        });
      },
      {
        threshold: 0.1,
        rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
      }
    );

    this.elements.forEach((element) => {
      observer.observe(element);
    });
  }
}

// Clipboard Helper Module
class ClipboardHelper {
  private copyButtons: NodeListOf<Element>;
  private toast: HTMLElement | null;

  constructor() {
    this.copyButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.copy-btn');
    this.toast = document.getElementById('toast');
    this.init();
  }

  private init(): void {
    this.setupEventListeners();
  }

  private setupEventListeners(): void {
    this.copyButtons.forEach((button) => {
      button.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        e.stopPropagation();
        const contactItem = button.closest('.contact-item');
        if (contactItem) {
          const textToCopy = contactItem.getAttribute('data-copy');
          if (textToCopy) {
            this.copyToClipboard(textToCopy);
          }
        }
      });
    });
  }

  private async copyToClipboard(text: string): Promise<void> {
    try {
      await navigator.clipboard.writeText(text);
      this.showToast();
    } catch (err) {
      console.error('Failed to copy text: ', err);
    }
  }

  private showToast(): void {
    if (this.toast) {
      this.toast.classList.add('show');
      setTimeout(() => {
        this.toast?.classList.remove('show');
      }, 2000);
    }
  }
}

// Back to Top Module
class BackToTop {
  private backToTopButton: HTMLElement | null;

  constructor() {
    this.backToTopButton = document.querySelector('.back-to-top');
    this.init();
  }

  private init(): void {
    this.setupEventListeners();
  }

  private setupEventListeners(): void {
    window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
      this.toggleVisibility();
    });

    this.backToTopButton?.addEventListener('click', () => {
      this.scrollToTop();
    });
  }

  private toggleVisibility(): void {
    if (this.backToTopButton) {
      if (window.scrollY > 300) {
        this.backToTopButton.classList.add('visible');
      } else {
        this.backToTopButton.classList.remove('visible');
      }
    }
  }

  private scrollToTop(): void {
    window.scrollTo({
      top: 0,
      behavior: 'smooth'
    });
  }
}

// Navigation Menu Module
class NavMenu {
  private hamburger: HTMLElement | null;
  private navMenu: HTMLElement | null;

  constructor() {
    this.hamburger = document.querySelector('.hamburger');
    this.navMenu = document.querySelector('.nav-menu');
    this.init();
  }

  private init(): void {
    this.setupEventListeners();
  }

  private setupEventListeners(): void {
    this.hamburger?.addEventListener('click', () => {
      this.toggleMenu();
    });

    // Close menu when clicking on a link
    const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link');
    navLinks.forEach((link) => {
      link.addEventListener('click', () => {
        this.closeMenu();
      });
    });

    // Close menu when clicking outside
    document.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
      if (this.navMenu?.classList.contains('active')) {
        const target = e.target as Element;
        if (!this.navMenu.contains(target) && !this.hamburger?.contains(target)) {
          this.closeMenu();
        }
      }
    });
  }

  private toggleMenu(): void {
    this.navMenu?.classList.toggle('active');
    this.hamburger?.classList.toggle('active');
  }

  private closeMenu(): void {
    this.navMenu?.classList.remove('active');
    this.hamburger?.classList.remove('active');
  }
}

// Progress Bar Animation Module
class ProgressBarAnimation {
  private progressBars: NodeListOf<Element>;

  constructor() {
    this.progressBars = document.querySelectorAll('.progress-fill');
    this.init();
  }

  private init(): void {
    this.observeProgressBars();
  }

  private observeProgressBars(): void {
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver(
      (entries) => {
        entries.forEach((entry) => {
          if (entry.isIntersecting) {
            this.animateProgressBar(entry.target as HTMLElement);
          }
        });
      },
      {
        threshold: 0.5
      }
    );

    this.progressBars.forEach((bar) => {
      observer.observe(bar);
    });
  }

  private animateProgressBar(element: HTMLElement): void {
    const width = element.getAttribute('data-width');
    if (width) {
      setTimeout(() => {
        element.style.width = width + '%';
      }, 200);
    }
  }
}

// Card Hover Effects Module
class CardHoverEffects {
  private cards: NodeListOf<Element>;

  constructor() {
    this.cards = document.querySelectorAll('.card, .timeline-content, .work-content, .interest-card');
    this.init();
  }

  private init(): void {
    this.setupHoverEffects();
  }

  private setupHoverEffects(): void {
    this.cards.forEach((card) => {
      card.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {
        this.addHoverEffect(card as HTMLElement);
      });

      card.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
        this.removeHoverEffect(card as HTMLElement);
      });
    });
  }

  private addHoverEffect(element: HTMLElement): void {
    element.style.transform = 'translateY(-4px)';
    element.style.boxShadow = '0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 4px 6px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)';
  }

  private removeHoverEffect(element: HTMLElement): void {
    element.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
    element.style.boxShadow = '';
  }
}

// Smooth Scroll Module
class SmoothScroll {
  constructor() {
    this.init();
  }

  private init(): void {
    this.setupSmoothScroll();
  }

  private setupSmoothScroll(): void {
    const links = document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]');
    links.forEach((link) => {
      link.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        const targetId = link.getAttribute('href')?.substring(1);
        if (targetId) {
          const targetElement = document.getElementById(targetId);
          if (targetElement) {
            targetElement.scrollIntoView({
              behavior: 'smooth',
              block: 'start'
            });
          }
        }
      });
    });
  }
}

// Main Application
class AboutPage {
  private themeToggle: ThemeToggle;
  private scrollReveal: ScrollReveal;
  private clipboardHelper: ClipboardHelper;
  private backToTop: BackToTop;
  private navMenu: NavMenu;
  private progressBarAnimation: ProgressBarAnimation;
  private cardHoverEffects: CardHoverEffects;
  private smoothScroll: SmoothScroll;

  constructor() {
    this.themeToggle = new ThemeToggle();
    this.scrollReveal = new ScrollReveal();
    this.clipboardHelper = new ClipboardHelper();
    this.backToTop = new BackToTop();
    this.navMenu = new NavMenu();
    this.progressBarAnimation = new ProgressBarAnimation();
    this.cardHoverEffects = new CardHoverEffects();
    this.smoothScroll = new SmoothScroll();
  }
}

// Initialize the application when DOM is loaded
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
  new AboutPage();
});
```

```html
          <div class="travel-detail-text">
            <h2>旅程概述</h2>
            <p>這次東京之旅是我第一次踏上日本的土地，充滿了期待和興奮。在為期7天的旅程中，我深入體驗了東京這座現代化都市的獨特魅力，從傳統的淺草寺到現代的東京鐵塔，從繁華的銀座到寧靜的皇居，每一處都留下了深刻的印象。</p>
            
            <h3>主要景點</h3>
            <ul>
              <li><strong>淺草寺</strong> - 體驗傳統日本文化，感受古老的寺廟氛圍</li>
              <li><strong>東京鐵塔</strong> - 俯瞰整個東京市區，欣賞壯觀的城市景觀</li>
              <li><strong>銀座</strong> - 感受現代東京的繁華與時尚</li>
              <li><strong>皇居</strong> - 在都市中尋找寧靜，欣賞傳統日式庭園</li>
              <li><strong>新宿</strong> - 體驗東京的夜生活和購物文化</li>
            </ul>

            <h3>美食體驗</h3>
            <p>在東京期間，我品嚐了各種道地的日式料理，從街邊的章魚燒到高級的懷石料理，每一道菜都展現了日本料理的精緻和用心。特別是在築地市場品嚐的新鮮壽司，至今仍讓我回味無窮。</p>

            <h3>文化感受</h3>
            <p>這次旅行讓我深刻感受到日本文化的獨特魅力。從人們的禮貌和秩序，到建築的設計和美學，每一個細節都體現了日本文化的精緻和用心。這也讓我更加欣賞不同文化的多元性。</p>

              <li><strong>神木群</strong> - 漫步在千年神木林中，感受大自然的偉大</li>
              <li><strong>櫻花季</strong> - 欣賞阿里山櫻花的浪漫美景</li>
              <li><strong>森林步道</strong> - 在森林中健行，呼吸新鮮空氣</li>
            </ul>

            <h3>文化體驗</h3>
            <p>阿里山不僅有美麗的自然景觀，也有豐富的文化內涵。從原住民文化到鐵路文化，從茶文化到森林文化，每一種都讓我對台灣有了更深的認識。</p>

            <h3>心靈收穫</h3>
            <p>在阿里山的寧靜環境中，我有機會靜下心來思考人生和未來。這次旅行不僅讓我欣賞到了美麗的風景，也讓我獲得了心靈上的洗禮和成長。</p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
```

```html
            <h2>旅程概述</h2>
            <p>這次東京之旅是我第一次踏上日本的土地，充滿了期待和興奮。在為期7天的旅程中，我深入體驗了東京這座現代化都市的獨特魅力，從傳統的淺草寺到現代的東京鐵塔，從繁華的銀座到寧靜的皇居，每一處都留下了深刻的印象。</p>
            
            <h3>主要景點</h3>
            <ul>
              <li><strong>淺草寺</strong> - 體驗傳統日本文化，感受古老的寺廟氛圍</li>
              <li><strong>東京鐵塔</strong> - 俯瞰整個東京市區，欣賞壯觀的城市景觀</li>
              <li><strong>銀座</strong> - 感受現代東京的繁華與時尚</li>
              <li><strong>皇居</strong> - 在都市中尋找寧靜，欣賞傳統日式庭園</li>
              <li><strong>新宿</strong> - 體驗東京的夜生活和購物文化</li>
            </ul>

            <h3>美食體驗</h3>
            <p>在東京期間，我品嚐了各種道地的日式料理，從街邊的章魚燒到高級的懷石料理，每一道菜都展現了日本料理的精緻和用心。特別是在築地市場品嚐的新鮮壽司，至今仍讓我回味無窮。</p>

            <h3>文化感受</h3>
            <p>這次旅行讓我深刻感受到日本文化的獨特魅力。從人們的禮貌和秩序，到建築的設計和美學，每一個細節都體現了日本文化的精緻和用心。這也讓我更加欣賞不同文化的多元性。</p>
```

```html
            <h3>主要景點</h3>

              <li><strong>東京鐵塔</strong> - 俯瞰整個東京市區，欣賞壯觀的城市景觀</li>
              <li><strong>銀座</strong> - 感受現代東京的繁華與時尚</li>
              <li><strong>皇居</strong> - 在都市中尋找寧靜，欣賞傳統日式庭園</li>
              <li><strong>新宿</strong> - 體驗東京的夜生活和購物文化</li>

            <h2>旅程概述</h2>
```
```html
            <p>這次東京之旅是我第一次踏上日本的土地，充滿了期待和興奮。在為期7天的旅程中，我深入體驗了東京這座現代化都市的獨特魅力，從傳統的淺草寺到現代的東京鐵塔，從繁華的銀座到寧靜的皇居，每一處都留下了深刻的印象。</p>
            
            <h3>主要景點</h3>
            <ul>
              <li><strong>淺草寺</strong> - 體驗傳統日本文化，感受古老的寺廟氛圍</li>
              <li><strong>東京鐵塔</strong> - 俯瞰整個東京市區，欣賞壯觀的城市景觀</li>
              <li><strong>銀座</strong> - 感受現代東京的繁華與時尚</li>
              <li><strong>皇居</strong> - 在都市中尋找寧靜，欣賞傳統日式庭園</li>
              <li><strong>新宿</strong> - 體驗東京的夜生活和購物文化</li>
            </ul>

            <h3>美食體驗</h3>
            <p>在東京期間，我品嚐了各種道地的日式料理，從街邊的章魚燒到高級的懷石料理，每一道菜都展現了日本料理的精緻和用心。特別是在築地市場品嚐的新鮮壽司，至今仍讓我回味無窮。</p>

            <h3>文化感受</h3>
            <p>這次旅行讓我深刻感受到日本文化的獨特魅力。從人們的禮貌和秩序，到建築的設計和美學，每一個細節都體現了日本文化的精緻和用心。這也讓我更加欣賞不同文化的多元性。</p>
```

```html
            <p>這次東京之旅是我第一次踏上日本的土地，充滿了期待和興奮。在為期7天的旅程中，我深入體驗了東京這座現代化都市的獨特魅力，從傳統的淺草寺到現代的東京鐵塔，從繁華的銀座到寧靜的皇居，每一處都留下了深刻的印象。</p>
            
            <h3>主要景點</h3>
            <ul>
              <li><strong>淺草寺</strong> - 體驗傳統日本文化，感受古老的寺廟氛圍</li>
              <li><strong>東京鐵塔</strong> - 俯瞰整個東京市區，欣賞壯觀的城市景觀</li>
              <li><strong>銀座</strong> - 感受現代東京的繁華與時尚</li>
              <li><strong>皇居</strong> - 在都市中尋找寧靜，欣賞傳統日式庭園</li>
              <li><strong>新宿</strong> - 體驗東京的夜生活和購物文化</li>
            </ul>

            <h3>美食體驗</h3>
            <p>在東京期間，我品嚐了各種道地的日式料理，從街邊的章魚燒到高級的懷石料理，每一道菜都展現了日本料理的精緻和用心。特別是在築地市場品嚐的新鮮壽司，至今仍讓我回味無窮。</p>

            <h3>文化感受</h3>
            <p>這次旅行讓我深刻感受到日本文化的獨特魅力。從人們的禮貌和秩序，到建築的設計和美學，每一個細節都體現了日本文化的精緻和用心。這也讓我更加欣賞不同文化的多元性。</p>
```

```html
          <h1 class="travel-detail-title">東京文化之旅</h1>
          <p class="travel-detail-subtitle">2023年12月 • 日本東京</p>
        </div>

        <div class="travel-detail-content">
          <div class="travel-detail-image">

              <i class="fas fa-mountain"></i>
              <p>東京夜景</p>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="travel-detail-text">
            <h2>旅程概述</h2>
            <p>這次東京之旅是我第一次踏上日本的土地，充滿了期待和興奮。在為期7天的旅程中，我深入體驗了東京這座現代化都市的獨特魅力，從傳統的淺草寺到現代的東京鐵塔，從繁華的銀座到寧靜的皇居，每一處都留下了深刻的印象。</p>
            
            <h3>主要景點</h3>
            <ul>
              <li><strong>淺草寺</strong> - 體驗傳統日本文化，感受古老的寺廟氛圍</li>
              <li><strong>東京鐵塔</strong> - 俯瞰整個東京市區，欣賞壯觀的城市景觀</li>
              <li><strong>銀座</strong> - 感受現代東京的繁華與時尚</li>
              <li><strong>皇居</strong> - 在都市中尋找寧靜，欣賞傳統日式庭園</li>
              <li><strong>新宿</strong> - 體驗東京的夜生活和購物文化</li>
            </ul>

            <h3>美食體驗</h3>
            <p>在東京期間，我品嚐了各種道地的日式料理，從街邊的章魚燒到高級的懷石料理，每一道菜都展現了日本料理的精緻和用心。特別是在築地市場品嚐的新鮮壽司，至今仍讓我回味無窮。</p>

            <h3>文化感受</h3>
            <p>這次旅行讓我深刻感受到日本文化的獨特魅力。從人們的禮貌和秩序，到建築的設計和美學，每一個細節都體現了日本文化的精緻和用心。這也讓我更加欣賞不同文化的多元性。</p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </section>
```

```html
            <p>這次東京之旅是我第一次踏上日本的土地，充滿了期待和興奮。在為期7天的旅程中，我深入體驗了東京這座現代化都市的獨特魅力，從傳統的淺草寺到現代的東京鐵塔，從繁華的銀座到寧靜的皇居，每一處都留下了深刻的印象。</p>

              <li><strong>銀座</strong> - 感受現代東京的繁華與時尚</li>
              <li><strong>皇居</strong> - 在都市中尋找寧靜，欣賞傳統日式庭園</li>

            <h2>旅程概述</h2>
            <p>作為台灣的首都，台北擁有豐富的文化底蘊和現代化的都市風貌。這次城市探索讓我從不同角度認識了台北，從歷史悠久的古蹟到現代化的建築，從傳統的市場到時尚的商圈，每一處都展現了台北的多元魅力。</p>
            
            <h3>文化景點</h3>
            <ul>
              <li><strong>故宮博物院</strong> - 欣賞中華文化的瑰寶和藝術品</li>

              <li><strong>龍山寺</strong> - 體驗傳統的宗教信仰和建築藝術</li>

            <h3>自然景觀</h3>

            <h3>美食文化</h3>
            <p>台北的美食文化豐富多樣，從夜市小吃到高級餐廳，從傳統台菜到國際料理，每一種都讓我印象深刻。特別是在夜市品嚐的各種小吃，讓我真正體驗到了台灣的飲食文化。</p>
```

```css
/* CSS Variables */
:root {

}

.experience-timeline {
  position: relative;
  padding-left: 2rem;
}

.experience-timeline::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  left: 1rem;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: 2px;
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
}

.experience-item {
  position: relative;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
  padding-left: 2rem;
}

.experience-item::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  left: -1.5rem;
  top: 0.5rem;
  width: 12px;
  height: 12px;
  background: var(--primary-color);
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 3px solid var(--bg-light);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px var(--primary-color);
}

.experience-header {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.experience-header h4 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  margin: 0;
}

.experience-company {
  background: var(--accent-color);
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
  border-radius: 15px;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.experience-details {
  margin-left: 0;
}

.experience-period {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.experience-location {
  color: #7f8c8d;
  margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.experience-responsibilities {
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
}

.experience-responsibilities li {
  position: relative;
  padding-left: 1.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  color: #555;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.experience-responsibilities li::before {
  content: '▶';
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-size: 0.8rem;
}

.projects-list {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.project-item {
  background: #f8f9fa;
  border-radius: 12px;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  border-left: 4px solid transparent;
}

.project-item:hover {
  background: white;
  border-left-color: #3498db;
  transform: translateX(5px);
  box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.project-header {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
}

.project-header h4 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  margin: 0;
  flex: 1;
}

.project-type {
  background: var(--accent-color);
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
  border-radius: 15px;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.project-period {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.project-description {
  color: #555;
  line-height: 1.6;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.project-tech {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

.tech-tag {
  background: var(--primary-color);
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
  border-radius: 15px;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.achievements-list {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.achievement-item {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 1rem;
  padding: 1rem;
  background: #f8f9fa;
  border-radius: 12px;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.achievement-item:hover {
  background: white;
  transform: translateX(5px);
  box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.achievement-icon {
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.achievement-content h4 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.achievement-org {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.achievement-date {
  color: #7f8c8d;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
}

.section-card {
  background: white;
  border-radius: 15px;
  padding: 2rem;
  box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.section-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.section-title {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.75rem;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color);
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.section-title i {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-size: 1.2rem;
}

/* Timeline */
.timeline {
  position: relative;
  padding-left: 2rem;
}

.timeline::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  left: 1rem;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: 2px;
  background: #3498db;
}

.timeline-item {
  position: relative;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.timeline-marker {
  position: absolute;
  left: -1.5rem;
  top: 0.5rem;
  width: 12px;
  height: 12px;
  background: #3498db;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 3px solid white;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px #3498db;
}

.timeline-content h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.timeline-period {
  color: #3498db;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.achievements {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  margin-top: 1rem;
}

.achievement {
  background: #f39c12;
  color: white;
  padding: 0.3rem 0.8rem;
  border-radius: 20px;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

/* Skills */
.skills-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
  gap: 2rem;
}

.skill-category h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
}

.skill-item {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.skill-bar {
  width: 60%;
  height: 8px;
  background: #ecf0f1;
  border-radius: 4px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.skill-progress {
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  border-radius: 4px;
  width: 0;
  transition: width 1.5s ease-in-out;
}

/* Projects */
.projects-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.project-card {
  background: #f8f9fa;
  border-radius: 12px;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.project-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.project-image {
  width: 60px;
  height: 60px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea, #764ba2);
  border-radius: 12px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: white;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.project-content h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.project-content p {
  color: #555;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.project-tags {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

/* Interests */
.interests-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr));
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.interest-card {
  text-align: center;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  background: #f8f9fa;
  border-radius: 12px;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.interest-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.interest-icon {
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.interest-card h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.interest-card p {
  color: #555;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

/* Travel Page */
.travel-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
  gap: 2rem;
  margin-top: 2rem;
}

.travel-card {
  background: var(--bg-light);
  border-radius: 20px;
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: 0 15px 40px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.2);
  transition: all 0.4s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
  position: relative;
  transform-style: preserve-3d;
  border: 3px solid var(--primary-color);
  min-height: 450px;
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.travel-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-15px) rotateX(5deg);
  box-shadow: 0 25px 50px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.3);
  border-color: var(--accent-color);
}

.travel-image {
  height: 220px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.travel-image .image-placeholder {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: transparent;
  border-radius: 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  font-size: 1.2rem;
}

.travel-image::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 0%, transparent 50%);
  transform: translateX(-100%);
  transition: transform 0.6s ease;
}

.travel-card:hover .travel-image::before {
  transform: translateX(100%);
}

.travel-image i {
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.travel-card:hover .travel-image i {
  transform: scale(1.1) rotate(5deg);
}

.travel-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
  color: white;
  padding: 1rem;
  border-radius: 50%;
  opacity: 0;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

.travel-card:hover .travel-overlay {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(1.1);
}

.travel-content {
  padding: 2rem;
  position: relative;
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.travel-content h3 {
  color: var(--text-color);
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.travel-card:hover .travel-content h3 {
  color: var(--primary-color);
}

.travel-date {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.travel-content p {
  color: var(--text-light);
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  line-height: 1.6;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
}

.travel-tags {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

/* Travel Detail Pages */
.travel-detail {
  display: none;
}

.travel-detail.active {
  display: block;
}

.travel-detail-header {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 3rem;
  position: relative;
}

.back-btn {
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  background: var(--primary-color);
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  border: none;
  padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
  border-radius: 25px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

.back-btn:hover {
  background: var(--accent-color);
  transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-5px);
  box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.4);
}

.travel-detail-title {
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--text-color);
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
  background-clip: text;
}

.travel-detail-subtitle {
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  color: var(--text-light);
  font-weight: 500;
}

.travel-detail-content {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 2fr;
  gap: 3rem;
  align-items: start;
}

.travel-detail-image {
  position: sticky;
  top: 100px;
}

.travel-detail-image .image-placeholder {
  width: 100%;
  height: 400px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  border-radius: 20px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  box-shadow: 0 15px 35px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.2);
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.travel-detail-image .image-placeholder:hover {
  transform: scale(1.02);
}

.travel-detail-image .image-placeholder i {
  font-size: 4rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.travel-detail-text {
  background: var(--bg-light);
  padding: 2.5rem;
  border-radius: 20px;
  box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.1);
  line-height: 1.8;
  border: 2px solid var(--border-color);
}

.travel-detail-text h2 {
  color: var(--text-color);
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  position: relative;
}

.travel-detail-text h2::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  bottom: -8px;
  left: 0;
  width: 60px;
  height: 3px;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  border-radius: 2px;
}

.travel-detail-text h3 {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  margin: 2rem 0 1rem 0;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.travel-detail-text p {
  color: var(--text-light);
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.travel-detail-text ul {
  margin: 1rem 0;
  padding-left: 0;
  list-style: none;
}

.travel-detail-text li {
  position: relative;
  padding-left: 2rem;
  margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
  color: var(--text-light);
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.travel-detail-text li::before {
  content: '✨';
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  color: var(--accent-color);
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.travel-detail-text strong {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-weight: 600;
}

/* Contact Page */
.contact-content {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 3rem;
  align-items: start;
}

.contact-info {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.contact-card {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 1rem;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  background: white;
  border-radius: 12px;
  box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.contact-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.contact-icon {
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea, #764ba2);
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: white;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.contact-details h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
}

.contact-details p {
  color: #555;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.contact-link {
  color: #3498db;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.contact-link:hover {
  color: #2980b9;
}

.contact-form-container {
  background: white;
  border-radius: 15px;
  padding: 2rem;
  box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.contact-form h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.form-group input,
.form-group textarea {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 1rem;
  border: 2px solid #ecf0f1;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  transition: border-color 0.3s ease;
  font-family: inherit;
}

.form-group input:focus,
.form-group textarea:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: #3498db;
}

.form-group textarea {
  resize: vertical;
  min-height: 120px;
}

/* Footer */
.footer {
  background: #2c3e50;
  color: white;
  padding: 2rem 0;
  text-align: center;
}

.footer .container {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.footer-social {
  display: flex;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.footer-social a {
  color: white;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.footer-social a:hover {
  color: #3498db;
}

/* Animations */
.fade-in {
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateY(30px);
  transition: all 0.6s ease;
}

.fade-in.visible {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateY(0);
}

@keyframes float {
  0%, 100% {
    transform: translateY(0px) rotate(0deg);
  }
  50% {
    transform: translateY(-20px) rotate(5deg);
  }
}

@keyframes pulse {
  0%, 100% {
    transform: scale(1);
  }
  50% {
    transform: scale(1.05);
  }
}

@keyframes slideInLeft {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(-50px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

@keyframes slideInRight {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(50px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

@keyframes bounceIn {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: scale(0.3);
  }
  50% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scale(1.05);
  }
  70% {
    transform: scale(0.9);
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scale(1);
  }
}

/* Enhanced hover effects */
.travel-card,
.info-card,
.experience-section,
.projects-section,
.achievements-section {
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.travel-card::after,
.info-card::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.2), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.travel-card:hover::after,
.info-card:hover::after {
  left: 100%;
}

/* Staggered animations */
.travel-card:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.1s; }
.travel-card:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
.travel-card:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.3s; }
.travel-card:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }

.info-card:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.1s; }
.info-card:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
.info-card:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.3s; }
.info-card:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }
.info-card:nth-child(5) { animation-delay: 0.5s; }

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .hamburger {
    display: flex;
  }

  .nav-menu {
    position: fixed;
    left: -100%;
    top: 70px;
    flex-direction: column;
    background-color: white;
    width: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    transition: 0.3s;
    box-shadow: 0 10px 27px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
    padding: 2rem 0;
    gap: 0;
  }

  .nav-menu.active {
    left: 0;
  }

  .nav-link {
    padding: 1rem;
    border-radius: 0;
    width: 100%;
    justify-content: center;
  }

  .home-layout {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 2rem;
  }

  .personal-card {
    position: static;
  }

  .intro-title {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
  }

  .page-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }

  .contact-content {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 2rem;
  }

  .skills-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }

  .projects-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }

  .interests-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }

  .travel-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }

  /* About page responsive */
  .about-layout {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 2rem;
  }

  .about-left {
    order: 2;
  }

  .about-right {
    order: 1;
  }

  .personal-statement {
    padding: 1.5rem;
  }

  .personal-statement h2 {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
  }

  .experience-timeline {
    padding-left: 1rem;
  }

  .experience-timeline::before {
    left: 0.5rem;
  }

  .experience-item {
    padding-left: 1.5rem;
  }

  .experience-item::before {
    left: -1rem;
  }

  .experience-header {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: flex-start;
    gap: 0.5rem;
  }

  .project-header {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: flex-start;
    gap: 0.5rem;
  }

  .achievement-item {
    flex-direction: column;
    text-align: center;
    gap: 0.75rem;
  }

  /* Travel detail responsive */
  .travel-detail-content {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 2rem;
  }

  .travel-detail-image {
    position: static;
  }

  .travel-detail-image .image-placeholder {
    height: 250px;
  }

  .travel-detail-header {
    text-align: center;
  }

  .back-btn {
    position: static;
    transform: none;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }

  .travel-detail-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }

  .travel-detail-text {
    padding: 1.5rem;
  }

  /* Enhanced mobile animations */
  .travel-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-5px);
  }

  .info-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-3px);
  }

  .footer .container {
    flex-direction: column;
    text-align: center;
  }

  .intro-buttons {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
  }

  .btn {
    text-align: center;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .container {
    padding: 0 15px;
  }

  .personal-card {
    padding: 1.5rem;
  }

  .intro-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }

  .page {
    padding: 1rem 0;
  }

  .section-card {
    padding: 1.5rem;
  }

  .contact-form-container {
    padding: 1.5rem;
  }
}

/* Dark Mode */
body.dark-mode {
  background-color: #1a1a1a;
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .navbar {
  background: rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.95);
}

body.dark-mode .personal-card,
body.dark-mode .section-card,
body.dark-mode .travel-card,
body.dark-mode .contact-card,
body.dark-mode .contact-form-container {
  background: #2d2d2d;
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .nav-link {
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .nav-link:hover,
body.dark-mode .nav-link.active {
  background: #3498db;
  color: white;
}

body.dark-mode .theme-toggle {
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .theme-toggle:hover {
  background: #3d3d3d;
}

body.dark-mode .tag {
  background: #3d3d3d;
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .social-link {
  background: #3d3d3d;
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .form-group input,
body.dark-mode .form-group textarea {
  background: #3d3d3d;
  border-color: #555;
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .form-group input:focus,
body.dark-mode .form-group textarea:focus {
  border-color: #3498db;
}
```

現在添加教育時間軸的樣式：


```css
/* CSS Variables */
:root {
  --primary-color: #550000;
  --secondary-color: #FAF0E6;
  --accent-color: #8B4513;
  --text-color: #2c3e50;
  --text-light: #7f8c8d;
  --bg-color: #FAF0E6;
  --bg-light: #ffffff;
  --border-color: #e8d5c4;
  --shadow: 0 2px 10px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.1);
  --shadow-hover: 0 5px 20px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.15);
}

/* Reset and Base Styles */
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

html {
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
}

body {
  font-family: 'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif;
  line-height: 1.6;
  color: var(--text-color);
  background-color: var(--bg-color);
  overflow-x: hidden;
}

.container {
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 20px;
}

/* Navigation */
.navbar {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%;
  background: rgba(250, 240, 230, 0.95);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  z-index: 1000;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 20px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.nav-container {
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 20px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  height: 70px;
}

.nav-logo a {
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #2c3e50;
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.nav-logo a:hover {
  color: #3498db;
}

.nav-menu {
  display: flex;
  list-style: none;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  align-items: center;
}

.nav-link {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  padding: 0.75rem 1rem;
  color: var(--primary-color);
  text-decoration: none;
  font-weight: 500;
  border-radius: 8px;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  position: relative;
}

.nav-link:hover,
.nav-link.active {
  background: var(--primary-color);
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.nav-link i {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.theme-toggle {
  background: none;
  border: none;
  padding: 0.75rem;
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: var(--primary-color);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.theme-toggle:hover {
  background: var(--border-color);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.hamburger {
  display: none;
  flex-direction: column;
  cursor: pointer;
  padding: 0.5rem;
}

.bar {
  width: 25px;
  height: 3px;
  background: #2c3e50;
  margin: 3px 0;
  transition: 0.3s;
  border-radius: 2px;
}

/* Main Content */
.main-content {
  margin-top: 70px;
  min-height: calc(100vh - 70px);
}

.page {
  display: none;
  padding: 2rem 0;
  min-height: calc(100vh - 70px);
}

.page.active {
  display: block;
}

.page-header {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 3rem;
}

.page-title {
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.page-subtitle {
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  color: #7f8c8d;
  max-width: 600px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

/* Home Page */
.home-layout {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1.5fr;
  gap: 3rem;
  align-items: start;
  min-height: calc(100vh - 150px);
}

.personal-card {
  background: white;
  border-radius: 20px;
  padding: 2rem;
  box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  position: sticky;
  top: 100px;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.personal-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.profile-image {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.image-placeholder {
  width: 120px;
  height: 120px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea, #764ba2);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  margin: 0 auto;
  color: white;
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
}

.profile-info {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.name {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.title {
  color: #7f8c8d;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.profile-dots {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.dot {
  width: 8px;

  border-radius: 50%;
  background: #ecf0f1;
  transition: background 0.3s ease;
}

.dot.active {
  background: #3498db;
}

.tags-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.tag {
  background: var(--border-color);
  color: var(--text-color);
  padding: 0.4rem 0.8rem;
  border-radius: 20px;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.tag:hover {
  background: var(--primary-color);
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.social-links {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.social-link {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background: #ecf0f1;
  color: #2c3e50;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
}

.social-link:hover {
  background: #3498db;
  color: white;
  transform: translateY(-3px);
  box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(52, 152, 219, 0.4);
}

.intro-content {
  padding: 2rem 0;
}

.intro-title {
  font-size: 3rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.intro-subtitle {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: #7f8c8d;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.intro-buttons {
  display: flex;

  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.btn {
  padding: 0.75rem 2rem;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-weight: 600;

  border: none;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  font-size: 1rem;
  display: inline-block;
  text-align: center;
}

.btn-primary {
  background: var(--primary-color);
  color: var(--secondary-color);
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  background: var(--accent-color);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.4);
}

.btn-secondary {
  background: var(--secondary-color);
  color: var(--primary-color);
  border: 2px solid var(--primary-color);
}

.btn-secondary:hover {
  background: var(--primary-color);
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.4);
}

.intro-text {
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  line-height: 1.8;
  color: #555;
}

.intro-text p {
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.quote {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #3498db;
  font-style: italic;
  text-align: center;
  margin: 2rem 0;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  background: #f8f9fa;
  border-left: 4px solid #3498db;
  border-radius: 8px;
}

/* About Page */
.about-layout {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 2fr;
  gap: 3rem;
  margin-top: 2rem;
}

.about-left {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.about-right {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 2rem;
}

.info-card {
  background: var(--bg-light);
  border-radius: 15px;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.1);

  position: relative;

}

.info-card::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 4px;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));

.info-card:hover::before {

.info-card:hover {

.personal-statement {

.personal-statement::before {

.experience-section,

}

.experience-section:hover,

.section-title {

.achievement-item {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 1rem;
  padding: 1rem;
  background: #f8f9fa;
  border-radius: 12px;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.achievement-item:hover {
  background: white;
  transform: translateX(5px);
  box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.achievement-icon {
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.achievement-content h4 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.achievement-org {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.achievement-date {
  color: #7f8c8d;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
}

.section-card {
  background: white;
  border-radius: 15px;
  padding: 2rem;
  box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.section-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.section-title {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.75rem;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color);
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.section-title i {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-size: 1.2rem;
}

/* Timeline */
.timeline {
  position: relative;
  padding-left: 2rem;
}

.timeline::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  left: 1rem;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: 2px;
  background: #3498db;
}

.timeline-item {
  position: relative;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.timeline-marker {
  position: absolute;
  left: -1.5rem;
  top: 0.5rem;
  width: 12px;
  height: 12px;
  background: #3498db;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 3px solid white;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px #3498db;
}

.timeline-content h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.timeline-period {
  color: #3498db;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.achievements {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  margin-top: 1rem;
}

.achievement {
  background: #f39c12;
  color: white;
  padding: 0.3rem 0.8rem;
  border-radius: 20px;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

/* Skills */
.skills-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
  gap: 2rem;
}

.skill-category h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
}

.skill-item {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.skill-bar {
  width: 60%;
  height: 8px;
  background: #ecf0f1;
  border-radius: 4px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.skill-progress {
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  border-radius: 4px;
  width: 0;
  transition: width 1.5s ease-in-out;
}

/* Projects */
.projects-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.project-card {
  background: #f8f9fa;
  border-radius: 12px;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.project-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.project-image {
  width: 60px;
  height: 60px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea, #764ba2);
  border-radius: 12px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: white;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.project-content h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.project-content p {
  color: #555;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.project-tags {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

/* Interests */
.interests-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr));
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.interest-card {
  text-align: center;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  background: #f8f9fa;
  border-radius: 12px;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.interest-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.interest-icon {
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.interest-card h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.interest-card p {
  color: #555;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

/* Travel Page */
.travel-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
  gap: 2rem;
  margin-top: 2rem;
}

.travel-card {
  background: var(--bg-light);
  border-radius: 20px;
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: 0 15px 40px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.2);
  transition: all 0.4s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
  position: relative;
  transform-style: preserve-3d;
  border: 3px solid var(--primary-color);
  min-height: 450px;
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.travel-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-15px) rotateX(5deg);
  box-shadow: 0 25px 50px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.3);
  border-color: var(--accent-color);
}

.travel-image {
  height: 220px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.travel-image .image-placeholder {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: transparent;
  border-radius: 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  font-size: 1.2rem;
}

.travel-image::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 0%, transparent 50%);
  transform: translateX(-100%);
  transition: transform 0.6s ease;
}

.travel-card:hover .travel-image::before {
  transform: translateX(100%);
}

.travel-image i {
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.travel-card:hover .travel-image i {
  transform: scale(1.1) rotate(5deg);
}

.travel-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
  color: white;
  padding: 1rem;
  border-radius: 50%;
  opacity: 0;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

.travel-card:hover .travel-overlay {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(1.1);
}

.travel-content {
  padding: 2rem;
  position: relative;
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.travel-content h3 {
  color: var(--text-color);
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.travel-card:hover .travel-content h3 {
  color: var(--primary-color);
}

.travel-date {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.travel-content p {
  color: var(--text-light);
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  line-height: 1.6;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
}

.travel-tags {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

/* Travel Detail Pages */
.travel-detail {
  display: none;
}

.travel-detail.active {
  display: block;
}

.travel-detail-header {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 3rem;
  position: relative;
}

.back-btn {
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  background: var(--primary-color);
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  border: none;
  padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
  border-radius: 25px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

.back-btn:hover {
  background: var(--accent-color);
  transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-5px);
  box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.4);
}

.travel-detail-title {
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--text-color);
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
  background-clip: text;
}

.travel-detail-subtitle {
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  color: var(--text-light);
  font-weight: 500;
}

.travel-detail-content {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 2fr;
  gap: 3rem;
  align-items: start;
}

.travel-detail-image {
  position: sticky;
  top: 100px;
}

.travel-detail-image .image-placeholder {
  width: 100%;
  height: 400px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  border-radius: 20px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  box-shadow: 0 15px 35px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.2);
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.travel-detail-image .image-placeholder:hover {
  transform: scale(1.02);
}

.travel-detail-image .image-placeholder i {
  font-size: 4rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.travel-detail-text {
  background: var(--bg-light);
  padding: 2.5rem;
  border-radius: 20px;
  box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.1);
  line-height: 1.8;
  border: 2px solid var(--border-color);
}

.travel-detail-text h2 {
  color: var(--text-color);
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  position: relative;
}

.travel-detail-text h2::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  bottom: -8px;
  left: 0;
  width: 60px;
  height: 3px;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  border-radius: 2px;
}

.travel-detail-text h3 {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  margin: 2rem 0 1rem 0;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.travel-detail-text p {
  color: var(--text-light);
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.travel-detail-text ul {
  margin: 1rem 0;
  padding-left: 0;
  list-style: none;
}

.travel-detail-text li {
  position: relative;
  padding-left: 2rem;
  margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
  color: var(--text-light);
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.travel-detail-text li::before {
  content: '✨';
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  color: var(--accent-color);
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.travel-detail-text strong {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-weight: 600;
}

/* Contact Page */
.contact-content {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 3rem;
  align-items: start;
}

.contact-info {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.contact-card {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 1rem;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  background: white;
  border-radius: 12px;
  box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.contact-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.contact-icon {
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea, #764ba2);
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: white;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.contact-details h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
}

.contact-details p {
  color: #555;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.contact-link {
  color: #3498db;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.contact-link:hover {
  color: #2980b9;
}

.contact-form-container {
  background: white;
  border-radius: 15px;
  padding: 2rem;
  box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.contact-form h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.form-group input,
.form-group textarea {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 1rem;
  border: 2px solid #ecf0f1;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  transition: border-color 0.3s ease;
  font-family: inherit;
}

.form-group input:focus,
.form-group textarea:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: #3498db;
}

.form-group textarea {
  resize: vertical;
  min-height: 120px;
}

/* Footer */
.footer {
  background: #2c3e50;
  color: white;
  padding: 2rem 0;
  text-align: center;
}

.footer .container {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.footer-social {
  display: flex;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.footer-social a {
  color: white;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.footer-social a:hover {
  color: #3498db;
}

/* Animations */
.fade-in {
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateY(30px);
  transition: all 0.6s ease;
}

.fade-in.visible {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateY(0);
}

@keyframes float {
  0%, 100% {
    transform: translateY(0px) rotate(0deg);
  }
  50% {
    transform: translateY(-20px) rotate(5deg);
  }
}

@keyframes pulse {
  0%, 100% {
    transform: scale(1);
  }
  50% {
    transform: scale(1.05);
  }
}

@keyframes slideInLeft {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(-50px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

@keyframes slideInRight {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(50px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

@keyframes bounceIn {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: scale(0.3);
  }
  50% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scale(1.05);
  }
  70% {
    transform: scale(0.9);
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scale(1);
  }
}

/* Enhanced hover effects */
.travel-card,
.info-card,
.experience-section,
.projects-section,
.achievements-section {
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.travel-card::after,
.info-card::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.2), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.travel-card:hover::after,
.info-card:hover::after {
  left: 100%;
}

/* Staggered animations */
.travel-card:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.1s; }
.travel-card:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
.travel-card:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.3s; }
.travel-card:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }

.info-card:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.1s; }
.info-card:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
.info-card:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.3s; }
.info-card:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }
.info-card:nth-child(5) { animation-delay: 0.5s; }

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .hamburger {
    display: flex;
  }

  .nav-menu {
    position: fixed;
    left: -100%;
    top: 70px;
    flex-direction: column;
    background-color: white;
    width: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    transition: 0.3s;
    box-shadow: 0 10px 27px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
    padding: 2rem 0;
    gap: 0;
  }

  .nav-menu.active {
    left: 0;
  }

  .nav-link {
    padding: 1rem;
    border-radius: 0;
    width: 100%;
    justify-content: center;
  }

  .home-layout {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 2rem;
  }

  .personal-card {
    position: static;
  }

  .intro-title {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
  }

  .page-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }

  .contact-content {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 2rem;
  }

  .skills-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }

  .projects-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }

  .interests-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }

  .travel-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }

  /* About page responsive */
  .about-layout {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 2rem;
  }

  .about-left {
    order: 2;
  }

  .about-right {
    order: 1;
  }

  .personal-statement {
    padding: 1.5rem;
  }

  .personal-statement h2 {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
  }

  .experience-timeline {
    padding-left: 1rem;
  }

  .experience-timeline::before {
    left: 0.5rem;
  }

  .experience-item {
    padding-left: 1.5rem;
  }

  .experience-item::before {
    left: -1rem;
  }

  .experience-header {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: flex-start;
    gap: 0.5rem;
  }

  .project-header {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: flex-start;
    gap: 0.5rem;
  }

  .achievement-item {
    flex-direction: column;
    text-align: center;
    gap: 0.75rem;
  }

  /* Travel detail responsive */
  .travel-detail-content {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 2rem;
  }

  .travel-detail-image {
    position: static;
  }

  .travel-detail-image .image-placeholder {
    height: 250px;
  }

  .travel-detail-header {
    text-align: center;
  }

  .back-btn {
    position: static;
    transform: none;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }

  .travel-detail-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }

  .travel-detail-text {
    padding: 1.5rem;
  }

  /* Enhanced mobile animations */
  .travel-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-5px);
  }

  .info-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-3px);
  }

  .footer .container {
    flex-direction: column;
    text-align: center;
  }

  .intro-buttons {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
  }

  .btn {
    text-align: center;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .container {
    padding: 0 15px;
  }

  .personal-card {
    padding: 1.5rem;
  }

  .intro-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }

  .page {
    padding: 1rem 0;
  }

  .section-card {
    padding: 1.5rem;
  }

  .contact-form-container {
    padding: 1.5rem;
  }
}

/* Dark Mode */
body.dark-mode {
  background-color: #1a1a1a;
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .navbar {
  background: rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.95);
}

body.dark-mode .personal-card,
body.dark-mode .section-card,
body.dark-mode .travel-card,
body.dark-mode .contact-card,
body.dark-mode .contact-form-container {
  background: #2d2d2d;
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .nav-link {
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .nav-link:hover,
body.dark-mode .nav-link.active {
  background: #3498db;
  color: white;
}

body.dark-mode .theme-toggle {
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .theme-toggle:hover {
  background: #3d3d3d;
}

body.dark-mode .tag {
  background: #3d3d3d;
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .social-link {
  background: #3d3d3d;
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .form-group input,
body.dark-mode .form-group textarea {
  background: #3d3d3d;
  border-color: #555;
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .form-group input:focus,
body.dark-mode .form-group textarea:focus {
  border-color: #3498db;
}
```

現在添加語言技能進度條的樣式：


```css
.language-skills {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.language-item {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

.language-info {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
```

```css
/* CSS Variables */
:root {
  --primary-color: #550000;
  --secondary-color: #FAF0E6;
  --accent-color: #8B4513;
  --text-color: #2c3e50;
  --text-light: #7f8c8d;
  --bg-color: #FAF0E6;
  --bg-light: #ffffff;
  --border-color: #e8d5c4;
  --shadow: 0 2px 10px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.1);
  --shadow-hover: 0 5px 20px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.15);
}

/* Reset and Base Styles */
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

html {
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
}

body {
  font-family: 'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif;
  line-height: 1.6;
  color: var(--text-color);
  background-color: var(--bg-color);
  overflow-x: hidden;
}

.container {
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 20px;
}

/* Navigation */
.navbar {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%;
  background: rgba(250, 240, 230, 0.95);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  z-index: 1000;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 20px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.nav-container {
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 20px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  height: 70px;
}

.nav-logo a {
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #2c3e50;
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.nav-logo a:hover {
  color: #3498db;
}

.nav-menu {
  display: flex;
  list-style: none;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  align-items: center;
}

.nav-link {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  padding: 0.75rem 1rem;
  color: var(--primary-color);
  text-decoration: none;
  font-weight: 500;
  border-radius: 8px;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  position: relative;
}

.nav-link:hover,
.nav-link.active {

  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.nav-link i {

}

.theme-toggle {

  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.theme-toggle:hover {
  background: var(--border-color);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.hamburger {

}

.bar {

  height: 3px;

  transition: 0.3s;
  border-radius: 2px;
}

/* Main Content */
.main-content {
  margin-top: 70px;

}

.page {

  padding: 2rem 0;

}

.page.active {

}

.page-header {

  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.timeline-period {
  color: #3498db;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.achievements {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  margin-top: 1rem;
}

.achievement {
  background: #f39c12;
  color: white;
  padding: 0.3rem 0.8rem;
  border-radius: 20px;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

/* Skills */
.skills-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
  gap: 2rem;
}

.skill-category h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
}

.skill-item {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.skill-bar {
  width: 60%;
  height: 8px;
  background: #ecf0f1;
  border-radius: 4px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.skill-progress {
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  border-radius: 4px;
  width: 0;
  transition: width 1.5s ease-in-out;
}

/* Projects */
.projects-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.project-card {
  background: #f8f9fa;
  border-radius: 12px;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.project-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.project-image {
  width: 60px;
  height: 60px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea, #764ba2);
  border-radius: 12px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: white;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.project-content h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.project-content p {
  color: #555;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.project-tags {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

/* Interests */
.interests-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr));
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.interest-card {
  text-align: center;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  background: #f8f9fa;
  border-radius: 12px;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.interest-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.interest-icon {
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.interest-card h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.interest-card p {
  color: #555;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

/* Travel Page */
.travel-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
  gap: 2rem;
  margin-top: 2rem;
}

.travel-card {
  background: var(--bg-light);
  border-radius: 20px;
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: 0 15px 40px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.2);
  transition: all 0.4s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
  position: relative;
  transform-style: preserve-3d;
  border: 3px solid var(--primary-color);
  min-height: 450px;
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.travel-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-15px) rotateX(5deg);
  box-shadow: 0 25px 50px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.3);
  border-color: var(--accent-color);
}

.travel-image {
  height: 220px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.travel-image .image-placeholder {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: transparent;
  border-radius: 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  font-size: 1.2rem;
}

.travel-image::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 0%, transparent 50%);
  transform: translateX(-100%);
  transition: transform 0.6s ease;
}

.travel-card:hover .travel-image::before {
  transform: translateX(100%);
}

.travel-image i {
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.travel-card:hover .travel-image i {
  transform: scale(1.1) rotate(5deg);
}

.travel-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
  color: white;
  padding: 1rem;
  border-radius: 50%;
  opacity: 0;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

.travel-card:hover .travel-overlay {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(1.1);
}

.travel-content {
  padding: 2rem;
  position: relative;
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.travel-content h3 {
  color: var(--text-color);
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.travel-card:hover .travel-content h3 {
  color: var(--primary-color);
}

.travel-date {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.travel-content p {
  color: var(--text-light);
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  line-height: 1.6;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
}

.travel-tags {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

/* Travel Detail Pages */
.travel-detail {
  display: none;
}

.travel-detail.active {
  display: block;
}

.travel-detail-header {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 3rem;
  position: relative;
}

.back-btn {
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  background: var(--primary-color);
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  border: none;
  padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
  border-radius: 25px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

.back-btn:hover {
  background: var(--accent-color);
  transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-5px);
  box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.4);
}

.travel-detail-title {
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--text-color);
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
  background-clip: text;
}

.travel-detail-subtitle {
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  color: var(--text-light);
  font-weight: 500;
}

.travel-detail-content {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 2fr;
  gap: 3rem;
  align-items: start;
}

.travel-detail-image {
  position: sticky;
  top: 100px;
}

.travel-detail-image .image-placeholder {
  width: 100%;
  height: 400px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  border-radius: 20px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  box-shadow: 0 15px 35px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.2);
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.travel-detail-image .image-placeholder:hover {
  transform: scale(1.02);
}

.travel-detail-image .image-placeholder i {
  font-size: 4rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.travel-detail-text {
  background: var(--bg-light);
  padding: 2.5rem;
  border-radius: 20px;
  box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.1);
  line-height: 1.8;
  border: 2px solid var(--border-color);
}

.travel-detail-text h2 {
  color: var(--text-color);
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  position: relative;
}

.travel-detail-text h2::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  bottom: -8px;
  left: 0;
  width: 60px;
  height: 3px;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  border-radius: 2px;
}

.travel-detail-text h3 {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  margin: 2rem 0 1rem 0;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.travel-detail-text p {
  color: var(--text-light);
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.travel-detail-text ul {
  margin: 1rem 0;
  padding-left: 0;
  list-style: none;
}

.travel-detail-text li {
  position: relative;
  padding-left: 2rem;
  margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
  color: var(--text-light);
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.travel-detail-text li::before {
  content: '✨';
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  color: var(--accent-color);
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.travel-detail-text strong {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-weight: 600;
}

/* Contact Page */
.contact-content {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 3rem;
  align-items: start;
}

.contact-info {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.contact-card {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 1rem;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  background: white;
  border-radius: 12px;
  box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.contact-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.contact-icon {
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea, #764ba2);
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: white;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.contact-details h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
}

.contact-details p {
  color: #555;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.contact-link {
  color: #3498db;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.contact-link:hover {
  color: #2980b9;
}

.contact-form-container {
  background: white;
  border-radius: 15px;
  padding: 2rem;
  box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.contact-form h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.form-group input,
.form-group textarea {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 1rem;
  border: 2px solid #ecf0f1;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  transition: border-color 0.3s ease;
  font-family: inherit;
}

.form-group input:focus,
.form-group textarea:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: #3498db;
}

.form-group textarea {
  resize: vertical;
  min-height: 120px;
}

/* Footer */
.footer {
  background: #2c3e50;
  color: white;
  padding: 2rem 0;
  text-align: center;
}

.footer .container {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.footer-social {
  display: flex;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.footer-social a {
  color: white;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.footer-social a:hover {
  color: #3498db;
}

/* Animations */
.fade-in {
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateY(30px);
  transition: all 0.6s ease;
}

.fade-in.visible {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateY(0);
}

@keyframes float {
  0%, 100% {
    transform: translateY(0px) rotate(0deg);
  }
  50% {
    transform: translateY(-20px) rotate(5deg);
  }
}

@keyframes pulse {
  0%, 100% {
    transform: scale(1);
  }
  50% {
    transform: scale(1.05);
  }
}

@keyframes slideInLeft {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(-50px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

@keyframes slideInRight {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(50px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

@keyframes bounceIn {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: scale(0.3);
  }
  50% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scale(1.05);
  }
  70% {
    transform: scale(0.9);
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scale(1);
  }
}

/* Enhanced hover effects */
.travel-card,
.info-card,
.experience-section,
.projects-section,
.achievements-section {
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.travel-card::after,
.info-card::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.2), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.travel-card:hover::after,
.info-card:hover::after {
  left: 100%;
}

/* Staggered animations */
.travel-card:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.1s; }
.travel-card:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
.travel-card:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.3s; }
.travel-card:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }

.info-card:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.1s; }
.info-card:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
.info-card:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.3s; }
.info-card:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }
.info-card:nth-child(5) { animation-delay: 0.5s; }

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .hamburger {
    display: flex;
  }

  .nav-menu {
    position: fixed;
    left: -100%;
    top: 70px;
    flex-direction: column;
    background-color: white;
    width: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    transition: 0.3s;
    box-shadow: 0 10px 27px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
    padding: 2rem 0;
    gap: 0;
  }

  .nav-menu.active {
    left: 0;
  }

  .nav-link {
    padding: 1rem;
    border-radius: 0;
    width: 100%;
    justify-content: center;
  }

  .home-layout {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 2rem;
  }

  .personal-card {
    position: static;
  }

  .intro-title {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
  }

  .page-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }

  .contact-content {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 2rem;
  }

  .skills-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }

  .projects-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }

  .interests-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }

  .travel-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }

  /* About page responsive */
  .about-layout {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 2rem;
  }

  .about-left {
    order: 2;
  }

  .about-right {
    order: 1;
  }

  .personal-statement {
    padding: 1.5rem;
  }

  .personal-statement h2 {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
  }

  .experience-timeline {
    padding-left: 1rem;
  }

  .experience-timeline::before {
    left: 0.5rem;
  }

  .experience-item {
    padding-left: 1.5rem;
  }

  .experience-item::before {
    left: -1rem;
  }

  .experience-header {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: flex-start;
    gap: 0.5rem;
  }

  .project-header {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: flex-start;
    gap: 0.5rem;
  }

  .achievement-item {
    flex-direction: column;
    text-align: center;
    gap: 0.75rem;
  }

  /* Travel detail responsive */
  .travel-detail-content {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 2rem;
  }

  .travel-detail-image {
    position: static;
  }

  .travel-detail-image .image-placeholder {
    height: 250px;
  }

  .travel-detail-header {
    text-align: center;
  }

  .back-btn {
    position: static;
    transform: none;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }

  .travel-detail-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }

  .travel-detail-text {
    padding: 1.5rem;
  }

  /* Enhanced mobile animations */
  .travel-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-5px);
  }

  .info-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-3px);
  }

  .footer .container {
    flex-direction: column;
    text-align: center;
  }

  .intro-buttons {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
  }

  .btn {
    text-align: center;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .container {
    padding: 0 15px;
  }

  .personal-card {
    padding: 1.5rem;
  }

  .intro-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }

  .page {
    padding: 1rem 0;
  }

  .section-card {
    padding: 1.5rem;
  }

  .contact-form-container {
    padding: 1.5rem;
  }
}

/* Dark Mode */
body.dark-mode {
  background-color: #1a1a1a;
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .navbar {
  background: rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.95);
}

body.dark-mode .personal-card,
body.dark-mode .section-card,
body.dark-mode .travel-card,
body.dark-mode .contact-card,
body.dark-mode .contact-form-container {
  background: #2d2d2d;
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .nav-link {
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .nav-link:hover,
body.dark-mode .nav-link.active {
  background: #3498db;
  color: white;
}

body.dark-mode .theme-toggle {
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .theme-toggle:hover {
  background: #3d3d3d;
}

body.dark-mode .tag {
  background: #3d3d3d;
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .social-link {
  background: #3d3d3d;
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .form-group input,
body.dark-mode .form-group textarea {
  background: #3d3d3d;
  border-color: #555;
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .form-group input:focus,
body.dark-mode .form-group textarea:focus {
  border-color: #3498db;
}
```

```css
}

.interest-card i {
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  color: var(--primary-color);
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.interest-card:hover i {
  transform: scale(1.1);
}

.interest-card span {
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color);
  font-size: 1.1rem;
}

/* Tooltip */
.interest-card::before {
  content: attr(data-tooltip);
  position: absolute;
  bottom: -40px;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translateX(-50%);
  background: var(--text-color);
  color: var(--bg-light);
  padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius);
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  white-space: nowrap;
  opacity: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  z-index: 10;
}

.interest-card:hover::before {
  opacity: 1;
  bottom: -50px;
}
```

```css
/* Copy Button Styles */
.copy-btn {
  background: none;
  border: none;
  color: var(--text-light);
  cursor: pointer;
  padding: 0.25rem;
  border-radius: 4px;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  margin-left: auto;
  opacity: 0;
}

.contact-item:hover .copy-btn {
  opacity: 1;
}

.copy-btn:hover {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  background: rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.1);
}
```
